Class StraightLineFit

java.lang.Object
  StraightLineFit

public class StraightLineFit
extends java.lang.Object

Fit a straight line to the data, of the form z = mX(x - bX), z = mY(y - bY). These form the equation to a line, z = mX(x - bX), z = mY(y - bY), where m is the slope and b is the x-intercept This is a helper class that holds four public final fields: mX, bX, mY, and bY. Note: this routine ignores NaN rows.
